channel.title: Spotify on Open Operational Research
channel.description: Recent content in Spotify on Open Operational Research

item.title: Spotify & me
item.description: Note This post is analysis on data that I obtained freely - through GDPR, but you’re not getting access to. I’m not sharing my full playing history for the last 3 months with everyone who reads this! Also, the long delay since last post is because I moved house. Picking this back up now. Background GDPR means that EU citizens are entitled to a copy of personal data that a company is holding on them.
